rooms.description: The entrance hall is designed with Vastu guidelines in mind to promote positive energy flow. Materials are cost-effective and durable.
A spacious living room positioned towards the south-east for auspiciousness, following Vastu recommendations. Budget-friendly finishes used.
The kitchen is placed on the east side of the farmhouse as per Vastu principles to enhance fire element balance and energy. Designed with economical yet durable materials.
Adjacent to the kitchen for convenience, with minimalistic design that adheres to budget constraints.
Located in a quiet corner of the ground floor. Vastu principles recommend positioning master bedroom towards the north-west for stability and prosperity.
The secondary bedroom is placed adjacent to the master bedroom with similar design elements. Budget-friendly construction materials are applied.
Compact servant's quarters located near the kitchen and living area for easy accessibility while ensuring privacy.
A small storage space integrated within the ground floor layout to maximize utility and adhere to Vastu by avoiding clutter in living spaces.

openings.description: Front door aligned with the south to welcome positive energy as per Vastu.
East-facing windows in living room and kitchen for natural light and adherence to fire element balance.
North-facing window in master bedroom ensuring calm energy flow and privacy.

rooms.description: Additional guest bedroom or study area with a focus on Vastu by ensuring the bed is placed away from direct drafts.
Well-planned bathroom with water elements balanced as per Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Staircase connecting ground and first floors located on the west side, considered safe as per Vastu principles.
